name: There are 10 types of 10 seconds
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 51, theme "every 10 seconds".

A minimalist shmup were you've been sent to fight the Zorgoks by your captain.

Credits: 
Music by Destiny Knight: https://destiny-knight.itch.io/free-8-bit-music-pack-4
Font by Datagoblin : https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
